document_data.mainbody:
he Pembertons were a rich noble family from Highcastle during the 14 century DR.
*Lord Harold and Lady Mildred Pemberton were a married couple and aging members of the noble family who were known for their condescension and superiority over the common folk.
At some point decades before 1370s DR, Harrold Pemberton married into the noble family of Mildred Pemberton. The fact that Mildred never stopped bringing up even into the couples advanced years. Harrold was ashamed of his familys origins and kept it a secret from most.
In 1372 DR, Harrold and Mildred traveled to the city of Daggerford and cold me seen bickering inside the luxurious Chateau Elite in the Money Quarter.
